name: Earth, Hell, Earth.
description:
"Earth, Hell, Earth. in that order"(yes I am aware that i was suppose to put an "and" after the word hell) is a Game for the 1st ever VimJam, and this is what I have.  "Earth, Hell, Earth" is a rage platformer where you play as kid who is in hell(No on knows whys) and your goal as the player is to get the souls and go back to earth. Have fun!

Controllers:  A and D to move Space to jump, and E to go into your bubble

info on me:

Hi! My name is Gio, I'm 13, I've only recently started making games sometimes, I use the game engine GDevelop to make my games, I'm not really good at making games yet,  but I'll keep trying

this is my 3rd game lol
